content.rendered:
Pets and Mental Health Survey

  1. Test
    Questions
  2. Demographic
    Information
  3. Submit
    Survey

  • Thank you for your interest in our pets and mental health survey. We are interested in learning more about how people connect with pets and how that relates to their well-being to develop content and resources that may be useful in these areas.

    The survey is anonymous and will take approximately 10 minutes to complete.

  • Select all that apply.
  • Select all that apply.

  • To what extent do you agree with the following statements about your pet?
    There are no right or wrong answers; just answer how you truly feel.

  • Please select all that apply.
  • Please indicate whether you agree or disagree with the following statements. Select one response for each statement below.
  • Select all that apply.
  • Please take a moment to answer the following questions. Your answers are totally anonymous—we won't be able to identify you based on this information. Your answers will help us understand differences across the US and worldwide communities.

  • About You

  • Select all that apply.
  • This field is for validation purposes and should be left unchanged.

excerpt.rendered: The Pets and Mental Health Survey is a chance to reflect on how you connect with pets (or would like to connect with pets) and how that relates to your well-being. The survey is open to all, whether you own a pet right now or not! Your answers also help us develop better mental health supports for people like you!
